post:
<center>

As the great elliotc once said:

> [@elliotc said](/discussion/comment/45678/#Comment_45678): Our live need some sense of ritual, even a 0% discount code is discount code.

So to kick-start Black Friday in style - simply use the code "1337" on any [Budget Hosting](https://smallweb.net/order/main/index/budget "Budget Hosting") plan and you can grab a whopping 0% off and the best part is - it's RECURRING! :tongue: 


Now on to the actual discounts..
<br>

![](http://talk.lowendspirit.com/uploads/editor/m3/dmbo0i9dbv4x.png "")

Yep! We're offering 69% off any Shared, Reseller or Email hosting plan. Whether it's £19.99/year or £99.99/year originally - you can grab 69% off when you purchase and pay the discounted price each year.

Simply use the code BF20 on all applicable plans at https://smallweb.net

Shared:  https://smallweb.net/order/main/packages/shared/?group_id=44
Reseller: https://smallweb.net/order/main/packages/reseller/?group_id=20
Email: https://smallweb.net/order/main/packages/email/?group_id=31

---

We offer 8 locations in total across all of our different service types but not necessarily for each individual service.
SmallWeb Ltd is registered in England & Wales under company 12272693

It's 4:10AM, and I am planning to post more exclusive/random/unique deals once I'm awake :heart: 
</center>
